attributes.action: stand shoulder to shoulder with the USA if they launch cruise missiles with nuclear warheads against Iranian nuclear sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister promised to stand shoulder with the USA after 9/11,to his credit he has stuck by that promise.
        There is a strong possibility that George Bush will authorise cruise missile's with nuclear warheads to be launched against these sites in Iran,that are attempting to develop nuclear weapons.
        Cruise missiles with nuclear warheads are the only guarantee of stopping the Iranians from developing nuclear weapons.
                I believe we must stand by our most important NATO ally.
